press.boilerplateBody: Chatforia ezali app ya nsango ‚Äòprivacy-first‚Äô oyo esalaka kosolola na ndenge ya lokota ebele p…õt…õp…õt…õ. Ba nsango eb…îk…îlami na suka-ti-suka na ndakisa, mpe bobongoli ya kati ekoki lokota 100+ na ntango ya solo. Basaleli bakoki kosalela nsango ek…õsana, kotika bilembo ya kot√°nga na kopona, mpe kos√≠ngisa na ba appareil ebele. Ezali na iOS, Android, mpe web.

intro.body: Polit√≠ki oyo elobeli ndenge Chatforia (‚Äúbiso‚Äù) ezwaka, esalelaka, mpe ekabolaka maye elobami tango osalelaka ba application na biso mpe ba service. Tozali kotonga Chatforia mpo na kokitisa data oyo tokoki komona.
